problem_text_cn: 如图,已知1号,4号两个正方形的面积和为7,2号,3号两个正方形的而积和为4,则a,b,c三个方形的面积和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the sum of the areas of the two squares of No. N_0 and No. N_1 is N_2, No. N_3, and No. N_4, and the product sum is N_5, then the area sum of the three squares of a, b, and c is ()
raw_comment: 此题重点考察学生对勾股定理的理解,把握图形面积之间的关系是解题的关键.
